definition[0]: a time during the day or year when no work is done, especially in parliament, law courts etc
definition[1]: a short period of time between lessons at a school when children can go outdoors and play
example[1]: Her favorite things at school are music and recess.
definition[2]: a space in the wall of a room, especially for shelves, cupboards etc
definition[3]: if a government, law court etc recesses, it officially stops work for a period of time
